CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 8, 1952, pg. 30 reads: "Halloween Celebration - Hill City's annual Halloween celebration this year went off in grand style. First there was a parade of thousands of youngsters throughout the Hill District under the sponsorship of Hill City Youth Municipality and other agencies.  Then prizes were awarded at a reviewing stand at Centre Avenue Police Station. Here the youngsters are shown as they gathered in square near the police station. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Children's Halloween parade on Centre Avenue in front of Lucky Cafe Chop Suey, street no. 2157, and Clyde O. Davis Funeral Home, street no. 2159, Hill District
